name: Juggler's Jig
description:
The year is 2022. The Mega Corporation Md Connels has taken control of the world’s banks after improving their secret hot-dog recipe to perfection. From these though times a hero has risen. 

That hero is you. With the help of a newly developed cloaking technology, developed by your rebel comrades, you will try to infiltrate the Md Connels HQ and retrieve the recipe from their safe.

Best of luck, God knows you’ll need it facing Md Connels’ security bots.
